perl-lwp-protocol-https=6.10-r3 perl-convert-asn1=0.33-r0 perl-crypt-x509=0.54-r0 perl-file-which=1.27-r0 perl-string-shellquote=1.04-r3 perl-data-page=2.03-r2 perl-data-page-pageset=1.02-r3 perl-set-intspan=1.19-r3 perl-business-hours=0.13-r2 perl-scope-upper=0.33-r1 perl-css-minifier-xs=0.13-r2 perl-net-ip=1.26-r4 perl-javascript-minifier-xs=0.15-r1 perl-encode=3.19-r0 perl-encode-dev libpng=1.6.38-r0 freetype=2.12.1-r0 fontconfig=2.14.1-r0 ttf-droid \
 && PERL_MM_USE_DEFAULT=1 cpan install Business::Hours Data::Page::Pageset Email::Address Encode HTML::FormatText::WithLinks::AndTables HTML::FormatExternal Set::Infinite DateTime::Event::ICal DateTime::Event::Recurrence DateTime::Set Mozilla::CA \
 && rm -rf /root/.cpan
RUN addgroup -S docker-user ; adduser -S -G docker-user docker-user
USER docker-user
# Please add your HEALTHCHECK here!!!

RUN apk update \
 && apk add spawn-fcgi w3m perl-dev perl-utils glib gettext msmtp dcron tini fetchmail ca-certificates libc-dev curl gcc make msmtp perl-term-readkey perl-cache-simple-timedexpiry perl-class-accessor perl-file-sharedir perl-file-sharedir-install perl-variable-magic perl-b-hooks-endofscope perl-package-stash-xs perl-package-stash perl-sub-name perl-sub-identify perl-namespace-clean
